titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: RETINOPATHY OF PREMATURITY CLOCK HOURS MAXIMUM STAGE (RIGHT EYE) - Description

div.p: RETINOPATHY OF PREMATURITY CLOCK HOURS MAXIMUM STAGE (RIGHT EYE) is the same as attribute RETINOPATHY OF PREMATURITY CLOCK HOURS MAXIMUM STAGE Â of the right eye.
The value is in the range of 0-12.
